title: Utilizing Blogs in Online Learning: Exploring Mathematical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge (secondary education level) and basic mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: For working professionals accessing content via mobile devices during non-working hours (evenings/weekends), with variations in individual learning pace and mathematical backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step solutions to complex mathematical problems on blogs with at least 70% accuracy
Learners engage in interactions by providing three or more constructive feedbacks on peers' blog posts
Learners create five or more math concept explanation posts incorporating mobile-optimized visual elements (graphs, tables, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
